title: Lesson 1: What is a Disaster?
content:
Goal

Learn what disasters are and why we should know about them

  1. What is a Disaster? A disaster is something sudden and harmful. It can hurt people, damage schools or homes, and stop normal life.
  2. Kinds of Disasters Natural → earthquake, flood, cyclone, heatwave. Man-made → fire, road accident, building collapse. Health → pandemic.
  3. Why Do We Learn This? To stay safe and not panic...
